comments:
build I20041214-2000 (M4 test build)

- after installing Kim's dynamic plugin feature from her update site, I chose to
restart
- got an error dialog, with the following in the log
- after hitting OK, the shutdown apparently continued OK

Looks like the setTopRight in response to the dispose event is causing a folder
relayout, but the content widget has been disposed.

I'm not seeing this on every shutdown.  In this session, I had been playing
around with the Java perspective under different names, then deleting these
custom perspectives via the Perspectives pref page.  Maybe this leaves the
presentations in an inconsistent state.  Or it may be completely unrelated.
